CustomField.description: 'Late over 1 hour' = -3, 'Non Conversion' = -2, 'Poor report / document' = -2, 'Poor Behaviour' = -5, 'Poor Workmanship' = -3, 'Refused Job' = -4, 'Awol over 1 Hour' = -4, 'Late up to 30 minutes' = -1, 'Late 30-60 mins' = -2
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Late over 1 hour'),-3,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Non Conversion'),-2,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Poor report / document'),-2,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Poor Behaviour'),-5,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Poor Workmanship'),-3,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Refused Job'),-4,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Awol over 1 Hour'),-4,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Late up to 30 minutes'),-1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Office_Feedback__c, 'Late 30-60 mins'),-2,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 'Late over 1 hour' = -3, 'Non Conversion' = -2, 'Poor report / document' = -2, 'Poor Behaviour' = -5, 'Poor Workmanship' = -3, 'Refused Job' = -4, 'Awol over 1 Hour' = -4, 'Late up to 30 minutes' = -1, 'Late 30-60 mins' = -2
CustomField.label: Office Feedback Score
